## VectorAdapterOptions.selectedPaint property

The paint that applies to the features after it becomes selected.

**Signature:**

```typescript
selectedPaint?: Paint<F>;
```

## Example


```javascript
webMap.addLayer('GEOJSON', {
  paint: { color: 'red' },
  selectedPaint: { color: 'green' }
});
```
